text: Pauer is a surname. people with the name include: *Ernst Pauer (1826–1905), Austrian pianist, composer and educator *Fritz Pauer (1943–2012), Austrian jazz pianist, composer and bandleader *Géza Pauer (born 1976), Hungarian sprinter *Jiří Pauer (1919–2007), Czech composer *Maria Pauer (1734/36–1750), Austrian witch ==See also== *Paur
title: Pauer
